data.title: MW3 Warzone Urzikstan New Map Release Date and Details
data.meta_description: A new era of Warzone is upon us, following the massive release of Modern Warfare 3. With this new take on Warzone, we also launch into a whole new locale.
data.text:
A new era of Warzone is upon us, following the massive release of Modern Warfare 3. With this new take on Warzone, we also launch into a whole new locale. Welcome to the Urzikstan map, home of bleak cityscapes and snowy mountains as far as the eye can see.

Ready to find your new favorite place to drop? On this page of IGN's Warzone guide, we'll go over everything we know so far about the Urzikstan map in Warzone Season 1.

Loading

Play

The new Urzikstan map is set to release with the launch of Warzone Season 1 for Modern Warfare 3, on December 6, 2023.

Modern Warfare Warzone Urzikstan Map Details

The newest Warzone map to kick off the fresh Season 1 of Warzone features the best of urban, suburban, and rural locales. There are eleven new major Points of Interest to explore in Urzikstan, a total of 38 named locations overall, plus a drivable - yes, drivable - train that makes its way around the map!

Major Points of Interest:

Popov Power

Orlov Military Base

Levin Resort

Urzikstan Cargo

Seaport District

Old Town

Low Town

Hadida Farms

Zaravan City

Zaravan Suburbs

Shahin Manor

For the first 48 hours of Season 1 launch on December 6, 2023, Urzikstan will be the only available map for all game modes. The following game modes will be available on launch:

Battle Royale

Resurgence

Plunder

Urzikstan Resurgence

The following game modes will be available in Warzone Season 1 after the initial 48 hour window of season launch:

Lockdown

Slay Ride Resurgence (LTM)

MW3 Warzone Urzikstan New Environmental Elements

New environmental elements to reflect all the advancements Modern Warfare 3 have introduced, including a drivable train, horizontal ziplines, a new land vehicle.

New Drivable Train

The train on the new Urzikstan map can be driven by players! It is in essence a mobile Point of Interest. The train has forward and backward engine controls, and a handbrake in the caboose. You can also find the following features on board:

Buy Station

UAV Tower

Horn

Ammo Depot

Legendary Supply Crate

New Horizontal Ziplines

Urzikstan has some more challenging topography to travel than previous Warzone maps. That's where horizontal ziplines come in! You can now find horizontal ziplines spanning the distance from several different locations across the map.

New Vehicle: Coyote

Take the battle on the road... or off-road! The Coyote is a new lightly-armored vehicle capable of off-road venturing. There is a mounted machine gun atop it to deal with any enemy players who try to challenge you while aboard.

MW3 Warzone New Gulag

A new map means a new Gulag! Not only is this new edition of the Gulag reveal a different environment, the Urzikstan Gulag has some new gameplay updates:
